flamestrike.description: It's slower than fireball - harder to aim, but does more damage.

effects.title: Growth
effects.text: Fireboom takes 0.5 seconds to grow to full damage

triplet.description: Launch three bolts of fire that apply a brun effect upon hitting.

effects.title: Burn
effects.text: Each bolt of Trifire will add another stack of 2 damage per second to your enemy. There is no limit to the number of stacks, but you must hit them with Trifire at least once every 4 seconds to keep the fire burning.

difire.description: Launch two bolts of fire that apply a brun effect upon hitting.

effects.title: Burn
effects.text: Each bolt of Difire will add another stack of 2.5 damage per second to your enemy. There is no limit to the number of stacks, but you must hit them with Difire at least once every 4 seconds to keep the fire burning.

meteorite.description: Send a little meteorite towards your enemies!

effects.title: Fragile
effects.text: Meteorite will split in two if it collides with any other projectiles.

lightning.description: Huge knockback, if your aim is good enough.

effects.title: Recoil
effects.text: Beware the recoil that knocks you back a bit

effects.title: Growth
effects.text: Repeater takes 2 seconds to grow to full damage

effects.title: Redirect
effects.text: Refract can turn corners - hold the button down, then release the button to redirect.

backlash.description: Away and back. Hit your enemy twice

effects.title: Reset
effects.text: If it hits, reset the cooldown of repeater, letting you shoot almost immediately

effects.title: Lifesteal
effects.text: If this hits, steal 100% of health from enemy

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Gain a 20% movement speed bonus for 3 seconds (even if you miss).

repeater.description: Repeater is a fast striking weapon. Hitting the same enemy again will do 150% damage, and the third time it will do 200% damage (the maximum).

effects.title: Reset
effects.text: If it hits, reset the cooldown of repeater, letting you shoot almost immediately.

effects.title: Growth
effects.text: Repeater takes 0.4 seconds to grow to full damage

effects.title: Lifesteal
effects.text: If this hits, steal 100% of health from enemy

effects.title: Redirect
effects.text: Upon reaching your orignal cursor position, it will redirect towards the enemy

horcrux.description: The Horcrux will lifesteal from any nearby enemies, but will not kill them.

effects.title: Lifelink
effects.text: As long as your Horcrux is alive, you cannot die.

effects.title: Fragile
effects.text: If your Horcrux is hit, it will shatter.

scourge.description: Release a melee-range explosion that will send your enemies flying.

effects.title: Heavy
effects.text: Knockback reduced 75% while overloading.

effects.title: Limit Break
effects.text: Overload will Limit Break you, dealing 10 damage to yourself

phaseOut.description: Hold down the button to disappear from the world for up to 0.75 seconds. You can't do anything while phase shifted.

effects.title: Unwind
effects.text: Phase shift takes longer to cooldown the longer you stay in phase shift.

mines.description: Mark out your territory with some Energy Mines. Energy mines only do damage after 0.1 seconds.

effects.title: Expire
effects.text: If you walk away from the mines, they expire

blaze.description: Dash a short distance, burning through anyone in your path.

effects.title: Phase
effects.text: You can phase through obstacles
